column1: Here begins the story of the life of @entity4. @entity4's father was @entity0. @entity0's father was @entity1. @entity1's father was @entity5. And @entity5's father was @entity3. These Five men had ruled @entity3ton for the last One hundredZero years. For the last Twenty years, @entity4 had been the ruler. When @entity0 died, @entity4 became the ruler. In these last Twenty years, @entity4 brought lots of good luck to his people. They had never eaten so well. Most of his people ate Three meals a day. Recently, @entity4 had been having trouble with a band of troublemakers led by @entity2. @entity4 chose to do whatever he could to get rid of @entity2. So, he got @entity7 to get rid of @entity2. One night @entity7 sneaked into @entity2's bedroom and did away with him. With the bad man gone, all the people had a giant party and sang a song about the greatness of their ruler.
